name: Pool of Lies
description:
Install instructions

This game is made for the Community Game Jam 2019. Theme is "The Game is a Liar"

Pool of lies is a two player pool game where you play against a second player. The levels are designed in such a way that YOU end up playing for the second player as well!! 

Controls : 

Left and Right Arrow to turn table
Space bar to control gravity

Note : 

1. Due to the lack of time (as always) music and sound effects are minimal

2. There are some physics related bugs, which I surprisingly did not think would occur - I will try to debug them when I get time
